name: Lencor Technology
tag_list: systems-ingetrations, sharepoint-automation-and-archiving, business-process-automation, business-activity-managment-bam, eforms, intelligent-capture, workflows, disaster-recovery, ediscovery, deduplication, legal-holds, stored-electronic-information-sei,
overview:
a technology partner with new insight

Founded in 2003, Lencor Technology Inc. takes an innovative approach to providing business-class software, hardware, services, & consulting. Our main goal is to help our customers solve critical business issues by incorporating new functionality into their existing software & hardware systems. Our forward-thinking technology solutions provide your business a variety of options to increase levels of production, efficiencies, & business automation. Lencor’s business was built off of a single methodology of recycling and re-using your current technology. By doing this we provide our clients a cost effective alternative to purchasing new IT systems in efforts of overcoming the business challenges associated with todayâ€™s ever - changing economic times.

specialties & expertise

We provide our clients with an enlightened approach to corporate & government information management systems, structure, & strategy. All Lencor solutions have a focal point around data & information management with specialties and expertise in areas which include:

eDiscovery systems integrations governance/security disaster recovery retention scheduling advanced archiving intelligent capture compliance business process automation (BPA)
